mapper.select: select t.`id`,t.`produc_num`,t.`produc_code`,t.`produc_name`,t.`mfrsid`,t.`brandid`,t.`factory`,t.`produc_factory`,t.`unitid`,t.`produc_factorycolor`, t.`produc_color`,t.`batchid`,t.`size`,t.`function`,t.`color`,t.`style_id`,t.`year`,t.`tax`,t.`tax_price`,t.`trade_price`, t.`transfer_price`,t.`retail_price`, m.`mfrsname`,b.`brandname`,u.`unitname` from aa_tyj t left join c_mfrs m on t.mfrsid=m.mfrsid left join c_brand b on t.brandid=b.brandid left join c_unit u on t.unitid= u.unitid where id = #{value}
mapper.delete:
delete from aa_tyj where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select m.mfrsid,m.mfrsname from c_mfrs m left join cc_mg mg on m.mfrsid=mg.mfrsid left join c_goods g on g.goodsid=mg.goodsid where g.goodsid=6
select b.brandid,b.brandname from c_brand b left join cc_mg mg on b.goodsid = mg.goodsid left join c_goods g on g.goodsid=mg.goodsid where g.goodsid=6 and b.mfrsid = #{mfrsid} group by b.brandid;
